title: Aston Villa v Fulham: Premier League – live
summary: Unai Emery's team is looking for a much-needed boost in performance as they face Fulham. Daniel Harris provides a minute-by-minute report on the match. Fans are eager to see if the team can turn their fortunes around.

title: Newcastle v Arsenal: Premier League – live
summary: Newcastle aims to continue their recent success against Arsenal under Mikel Arteta. Rob Smyth provides a minute-by-minute update on the match. Fans are eager to see if Newcastle can maintain their strong performance.

title: England squad ratings: how all the Red Roses performed at Rugby World Cup
summary: John Mitchell's team showcased impressive team depth, with 32 players actively contributing throughout the tournament. Their solid performance ensured they faced minimal challenges from opponents. This strength in numbers played a crucial role in their success.

title: Cinderella review – fun-forward fairytale kicks off ENO makeover
summary: Julia Burbach's dynamic production of Rossini kicks off a new chapter for the English National Opera, showcasing a lively blend of chorus comedy. The fast-paced performance also marks conductor Yi-Chen Lin's debut with the company. This innovative staging sets an exciting tone for the opera's split-site era.

title: Alternative data suggest uneven inflation amid Trump’s numbers skepticism
summary: Recent scrutiny of BLS figures has led to a reliance on alternative indices from Truflation, Zillow, Adobe, and ISM, which reveal a more detailed view of price trends. These indices suggest that inflation dynamics may differ from traditional measures. This shift highlights the complexities in understanding current economic conditions.
